title: Can we have a nerf on the Wall of Yasuo, please?
body:
There have been many threads about this, but apparently it hasn't been taken into account since Yasuo almost did this buff not so long ago.

I'm not going to make a 400-line thread to complain about the spell but just explain my case to you which is just totally unfar in my case, i'm a Ahri player, the match up against Yasuo is just unbearable just because of the wall that blocks 100% of Ahri's damage sources, I want to say please Riot, at least let the W go through but it resembles a projectile so a little contradictory, so I'll rather ask pls ! made changes on his wall which is just too strong, and not only in my case :(
